title: How Fast Can a Pro Cyclist Run? Bart Lemmen, Nacer Bouhanni Are Smokin’ Fast in Running Shoes
content:
Cyclists are increasingly encouraged to add running to their training program to promote bone health – and it turns out they're pretty rapid.

Read the full article at How Fast Can a Pro Cyclist Run? Bart Lemmen, Nacer Bouhanni Are Smokin’ Fast in Running Shoes on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
